reviewText:
I purchased the VHS Tape as the DVD (new) is unavailable through U.S. sources, except (approximately) $61.00 used in DVD format.
A new DVD of this item can be purchased over the internet for 22 Euros.

This product was excellent, considering its' format.  The content was very good.  I am pleased with the content of the production, and the price value of the item.
